item.title: @elonmusk: When I first saw that Tim Walz changed the Minnesota flag to resemble the Somali flag, I thought the...
item.description: When I first saw that Tim Walz changed the Minnesota flag to resemble the Somali flag, I thought the story was too crazy to be true. Maybe it was a coincidence? Then I saw this video and it became obvious. These crooked politicians sold out our country.

item.title: @elonmusk: Neuralink will start high-volume production of brain-computer interface devices and move to a stream...
item.description: Neuralink will start high-volume production of brain-computer interface devices and move to a streamlined, almost entirely automated surgical procedure in 2026. Device threads will go through the dura, without the need to remove it. This is a big deal.

item.title: @elonmusk: Also, they killed American soldiers in Somalia and did unspeakable things to their corpses. Blackhaw...
item.description: Also, they killed American soldiers in Somalia and did unspeakable things to their corpses. Blackhawk Down is the tame, movie version of what happened.

item.title: @elonmusk: President Trump‚Äôs administration is dismantling the Minnesota-based Somali fraud networks that loote...
item.description: President Trump‚Äôs administration is dismantling the Minnesota-based Somali fraud networks that looted hundreds of millions of dollars from American taxpayers. American taxpayers deserve complete transparency. The prosecutions will continue.

item.title: @elonmusk: Welcome to Texas! No one will fight harder for the independent and free spirit of Texas than people ...
item.description: Welcome to Texas! No one will fight harder for the independent and free spirit of Texas than people who know it‚Äôs like when that‚Äôs taken away.

item.title: @elonmusk: And this is how anyone of honor should be!

item.title: @elonmusk: Somalis are 0.37% of the Washington population on the high end. DCYF records reflect that roughly 10...
item.description: Somalis are 0.37% of the Washington population on the high end. DCYF records reflect that roughly 10% of daycare businesses list Somali as a primary language. I find that odd.

item.title: @elonmusk: I paid so much in taxes one year that it broke the IRS computer (actually). Too many digits. They ha...
item.description: I paid so much in taxes one year that it broke the IRS computer (actually). Too many digits. They had to update the software to get it processed.
